author: fapeeler
msg: getdynamicaddress - fixed checks for private address 127. 172., 192.,
address ranges. Previously could capture wrong address for win OS's.
If someone installs a hypervisor or creates any additional adapters,
this routine needs to know which one is the public address to handout.

author: rickhall
msg: Fix incorrect condition while waiting to acquire locks.

author: coheigea
msg: [WSS-62] - A fix for " the crypto file not being retrieved in the doReceiverAction method for the Saml Signed Token"
- Added a test for this as well.

author: jleroux
msg: Merge all current CompanySubtitle labels in all languages.
It was a real mess. I wondered if I should put them all under a ComonCompanySubtitle label and remove all others.
But I guess they could be used with other meaning in real world applications (ie not OOTB). So I kept them all.
There are some duplicates in some languages. I kept them commentent out at end of each line.
